Sentencas: Mica gaskets and also composite gaskets containing compressive mica interlayers are under consideration as sealing materials in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Chemical interaction between Crofer 22 APU and mica-based gaskets under simulated SOFC conditions

Sentencas: To study potential interactions between the interconnect steel Crofer22APU and the mineral phases vermiculite (exfoliated) (K, Mg, Fe) 3(Si, Al) O-4(10)(OH)(2)) and talc (Mg3Si4O10(OH)(2)), corrosion experiments were conducted in simulated SOFC conditions.
Titulo: Chemical interaction between Crofer 22 APU and mica-based gaskets under simulated SOFC conditions

Sentencas: The opposite walls of the gaskets were simultaneously exposed to air and wet H-2.
Titulo: Chemical interaction between Crofer 22 APU and mica-based gaskets under simulated SOFC conditions

Sentencas: A substantial increase in the thickness of the oxide layers formed by the interconnect steel is observed with specimen containing talc.
Titulo: Chemical interaction between Crofer 22 APU and mica-based gaskets under simulated SOFC conditions

Sentencas: The Cr2O3/(Cr, Mn)(3)O-4 duplex layer normally formed on the Crofer is replaced by a thicker (factor of 5-10) layer of a complex microstructure that is assumed to contain Cr2O3, (Cr, Mn, Mg, Fe)(3)O-4 and Fe2O3 phases.
Titulo: Chemical interaction between Crofer 22 APU and mica-based gaskets under simulated SOFC conditions

Sentencas: The modified microstructure is found in the entire air manifold, with an increased thickness up to a distance of 300 mu m from the mica.
Titulo: Chemical interaction between Crofer 22 APU and mica-based gaskets under simulated SOFC conditions

Sentencas: It is proposed that magnesium is the critical component responsible for the accelerated oxide formation.
Titulo: Chemical interaction between Crofer 22 APU and mica-based gaskets under simulated SOFC conditions

Sentencas: A decomposition of talc is observed, which is discussed as the mechanism for the release of magnesium.
Titulo: Chemical interaction between Crofer 22 APU and mica-based gaskets under simulated SOFC conditions
